ingredients: 2 cups of chopped mixed veggies (onions, carrots, peas, mushrooms, blanched beans, blanched cauliflower and capsicum)
⅓ cup of chopped tomatoes (or can use amchur powder)
1 tbsp. coconut paste or yogurt or poppy seeds paste or 6 cashew nuts or ⅓ cup of low fat cream
1 tbsp. coconut paste or yogurt or poppy seeds paste or 6 cashew nuts or ⅓ cup of low fat cream
